title: PM Imran Khan launched ”Kamyab Jawan Programme For Youth Welfare
text:
#PMImranKhan #KamyabJawan #KamyabJawanProgramme #YouthWelfare

Prime Minister Imran Khan on Thursday “Kamyab Jawan Program” ‘Kamyab Jawan Program’ for the welfare of youth across the country.

PM Imran Khan said that Rs100 billion has been allocated for Kamyab Jawan Program, adding that the program will provide loans to youth without any interest.

The Kamyab Jawan Youth program comprises two categories: In the first category, the youth will be provided with loans from 100,000 to 500,000 rupees to start their business whilst in the second category, the youth will be provided with loans from 500,000 to five million rupees.
